content: If you know someone interested in attending an HL7 WGM but can't due to financial constraints, please let them know about the Woody Beeler scholarship. Applications are due March 22 and information is here: https://www.hl7.org/about/beeler_scholarship.cfm
how clinical data stored in FHIR. any way to convert excel data to fhir format
Please ask questions on the #implementers stream

Are you or a colleague interested in attending an HL7 WGM but need assistance? Apply for the Woody Beeler Memorial Scholarship! Applications accepted through October 29, 2021 and recipients notified by December 1, 2021. https://www.hl7.org/about/beeler_scholarship.cfm
